page.title: 17RAILWAYS(cont.)+LODGE FARM.
page.content:
Tuxford. They all closed when people began to travel by car. Some of the old stations can still be seen, but it is dangerous to go near them as Inter-City l25's pass by them at over a hundred miles per hour.
{LODGE FARM (E75.4N7O.4) by Raymond Miller and Simon Fox
Lodge farm is now an arable farm. Lodge farm and the fields cover l8O acres. The buildings are a milking parlour, bull shed, cow shed, a barn, two bungalows, motor engineering shed and two sheds. Old machinery and new are a siliger, mudrake, trailer, diesel tank and a drag. There are five sheep on the farm. There are seven fields on the farm, five of them grow wheat, one grows barley and the other grows oil seed rape. There is a
